Serena ChangeMan Builder Not Found

The command you selected requires a connection to an active installation of Serena ChangeMan Builder. If you have installed Builder, please verify that you have correctly configured Builder before continuing. See the Serena ChangeMan Builder User's Guide for more information.

Serena ChangeMan Builder

A Comprehensive, Automated Build Solution

Serena ChangeMan Builder is a comprehensive, auto­mated build solution for the entire enterprise, spanning client/server, IBM mainframe and web environments.

Available in Standard (Windows), Enterprise and z/OS editions, Builder supports multiple operating environments, programming languages, integrated development environments and configuration management systems.

Highlights of ChangeMan Builder are:

  • No scripting required
  • Web-client interface, command-line interface
  • Integrated to leading IDEs - Visual Studio .NET, IBM WebSphere Studio Application Developer, JBuilder
  • Integrates with Version Manager
  • Integrates with Dimensions

Benefits Across the Team

  1. For the project manager, ChangeMan Builder creates a reliable, repeatable process that ensures that the application is built correctly every time.
  2. QA and test managers experience fewer delays due to build errors common with manually scripted build systems.
  3. For the release engineer, Builder eliminates the tedious and error-prone task of manually scripting the software build.
  4. Developers benefit because with Builder integration to popular IDEs, they can use the same, reliable build process used by the release engineer, and still have control over the compiler options necessary for debug builds.

For More Information

For more information, please visit the Serena Website at http://support.serena.com.
